post:
URPad.net is pleased to present our newest promotion has been extended to 3 different locations available for ordering immediately, we have a very exclusive special with VPS servers located in US (Los Angeles & Dallas) and Europe (Luxembourg). URPad.net is a brand of FTNHosting.net which has been in business for close to 5 years!

Specials below are available in our Los Angeles, CA (US), Dallas, TX (US), or Luxembourg (EU) facilities. You may choose your desired location in the order form. Instant setup. 99.9% Uptime Guarantee. We guarantee 30 minute response times via ticketing you will no longer have to wait for Support as we are here 24x7.
> 
1024MB Ram
1536MB Burst Ram
40GB HDD
500GB Bandwidth
100Mbps Port
1 IPv4 Address
SolusVM/OpenVZ

All at an unbeatable price of $5.99/Month, Instant Setup!

Order now! https://billing.urpad.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=117

**Guaranteed Lifetime Price Lock** -- Price NEVER increases after your order is secured!

Monthly payment is available (you can pay on a month basis with absolutely no contract). However, additional discounts are available if paid quarterly, annually, biannually or triennially which is an option in the order form.

**Test IP/Files**

**Contact URPad.net**

URPad.net understands that you might have questions about the service we offer. This is why we make it easy for you to communicate with us.

Email sales at: sales@urpad.net
Call us toll free at: 1-888-743-8814

We view each and every client as an asset and we always remember that we are providing a service, and not a product. Thank you for your trust & business, we genuinely appreciate it.

Best,
Kevin Hillstrand
URPad.net
